scripts.deploy-test: aws s3 sync build/static s3://test-stxapps-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 --profile justnote && aws s3 sync build s3://test-stxapps-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://test-stxapps-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://test-stxapps-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3BW20Z9Q1C4V9 --paths /index.html --profile justnote
scripts.deploy-prod: aws s3 sync build/static s3://stxapps-web/static --size-only --delete --acl public-read --cache-control max-age=31536000 --profile justnote && aws s3 sync build s3://stxapps-web --exclude static/* --size-only --delete --acl public-read --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/service-worker.js s3://stxapps-web/service-worker.js --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws s3 cp build/index.html s3://stxapps-web/index.html --acl public-read --cache-control no-cache --profile justnote && aws cloudfront create-invalidation --distribution-id E3117Z1MT916R3 --paths /index.html --profile justnote
